Subject: Energon hunt
From: Jeremiah <rdahl@...>

Megatron finally snaped out of his pain he was in. Why had it stopped? he
wondered, did Galvatron get sick of torturing me. But he couldnt feel any
of Galvatrons thoughts, what could have happened? Well there would be time
to look into that later, he desperately needed energon, as his internal
computer kept replayling a warning in his mind, "Energon levels low, not
enough to sustain life support systems for long" and he coughed through
weakened breaths. He had been through to much to die here on this island.
Through a lot of strain he stood, and remembered the energon he had read in
the Arctic. "Predaking, hhhhhhuhhhhh, search this mudball for other
creatures, I need to recharge" he said weakly, and slowly lifted himself
off of the ground, and started to fly towards the Arctics.
